title: So... Let me tell you my history whit Project skin´s
body:
So, project skins came out the first thing i did whas buy the kata one since im a katarina main player i bought the 3 chest´s for ip from the store and i opened them all resulting in the 3 blueprint´s of kata/ekko/ashe and a part of the augment cache in everysingle one + 2 project core´s by chest .
 So lets resume this : I opened the 3chest´s avaiable on the store and i got the 3 blueprint´s and 2project cores in every one of them making a total of **5 Project cores** .

What i did next whas to open the augmented chest and this whas what i get : hextech galio / crimoson akali +  **more 2 project cores that wasnt given to me ** !


I first thought it was bugged so i exit league and logged in again but for my surprise it aren´t in my hextech loot i thought euw had a bit of delay i dunno so i keept playing **but now i realise i can do the project katarina blueprint becouse i dont own those 2 Project core´s that i didnt recieve** ! 



I need help please Riot
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Are you still experiencing this issue? I took a look at your account and it seems this may be resolved, but I wanted to check up on you. 

Let me know, thanks!
it´s already fixed ;) sry for the 4month reply thx anyway
